channel.title: Epoch on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Epoch on David Moreno blog

item.title: Debian get-together in NYC this next 1234567890
item.description: So, Biella already posted a reminder, and I’m doing it again on my blog, here. Attention New York City Debianistas, The astrological confluence of 1234567890[0], the impending release of Lenny[1], and the odd sighting of a horned mythical beast that cryptozoologists are calling a ‘new FTP-master-assistant/slave’ being sighted in the mist off the shores of the East River[2] will result in all emacs users to transcend and all vim users to be transponded to their respective motherships, which are scheduled for near-orbit on that night.
